IntroSection.name: Akash Mondal
IntroSection.short_intro: I enjoy using AI to tackle real-world challenges

AboutSection.desc: Aspiring to excel in leveraging AI for tackling real-world challenges, I am currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering at VIT Chennai. With a deep passion for applying cutting-edge technologies to drive impactful solutions, my goal is to contribute significantly to the field of AI. Through hands-on experiences in data science and deep learning, including internships at YASH Technologies and BHEL, I am developing a strong foundation in problem-solving and innovation. I am eager to collaborate on projects that push the boundaries of AI's capabilities and drive positive change.
